basics.name: Federico Antonio Yarza Castillo
basics.label: Full Stack Developer with more than 8 years of experience in mobile and web software development
basics.summary: +8 years of experience as a Full Stack Web and Mobile Developer. Currently I am a Full Stack Developer at Epidata working on projects such as Gabrica Hub and ANII Postulaciones. I live in Valencia, Venezuela. I have worked in different environments: from accelerating the development of start-ups to leading teams in multinational companies, always focused on developing scalable and customized solutions that accelerate the digital transformation of organizations.

work.name: Epidata
work.summary: Development of enterprise solutions and management systems, using modern and efficient technologies. I led critical projects such as the Multi-Country Digital Hub for Gabrica and system modernization for ANII.
highlights: Led the migration of the PHP 5.3 to 8.2 ecosystem for ANII, improving performance and security
Designed and implemented a monorepo with Turborepo and pnpm workspaces for Gabrica Hub
Implemented Multi-Zone architecture with Next.js, unifying multiple applications under a single domain
Developed backend with NestJS 10.x applying Domain-Driven Design (DDD) and Hexagonal Architecture
Established testing strategies with minimum 80% coverage in shared packages
Implemented multi-country internationalization with next-intl for 5 countries (Argentina, Colombia, Chile, Uruguay, Paraguay)
Acted as technical mentor for the development team

work.name: Devinol S.A
work.summary: Mobile application development with focus on offline-first experience and optimization of geolocation functionalities for dating and service applications.
highlights: Designed and developed physical training application with offline-first approach
Optimized geolocation functionalities for dating application, improving accuracy and performance
Led complete refactoring of beverage search application for restaurants

work.name: Freelance
work.summary: Design and implementation of customized digital solutions for various business sectors, including ERP systems, e-commerce, analytical dashboards and educational platforms.
highlights: Development of web and mobile applications with integration to ERP and accounting systems
Implementation of e-commerce solutions with connection to multiple payment platforms
Creation of interfaces for satellite data management
Design of comprehensive system for social media management and automation
Creation of platform for student management with attendance and grades control

work.name: Rv. Medios C.A.
work.position: Full Stack Developer with Specialization in Enterprise Solutions
work.summary: Comprehensive web development combining modern frontend technologies (React.js, Vue.js) with robust backend solutions in Laravel and PHP. Specialization in enterprise systems and digital transformation.
highlights: Development of ARP accounting administrative system for Lecomp
Implementation of microservices architecture for wholesale system
Development of custom payment module for Prestashop
Digital transformation of companies: Rv. Medios, Vepaco, Cobertura y Tasas, Lecomp
Comprehensive web development with React.js, Vue.js, Laravel and PHP
